member.name: PSFEATURE_CUSTPAPER
member.summary: The PSFEATURE_CUSTPAPER structure contains information about a custom paper size for a PostScript driver. This structure is used with the GET_PS_FEATURESETTING printer escape function.

member.name: PSFEATURE_CUSTPAPER.lOrientation
member.summary: Indicates the custom paper orientation. This member can be 0 to 3 if custom page size is selected. Otherwise, it is 1 and all other structure members are zero

member.name: PSFEATURE_CUSTPAPER.lWidthOffset
member.summary: Custom page width offset, in points.

member.name: PSFEATURE_CUSTPAPER.lHeightOffset
member.summary: Custom page height offset, in points.
